name: Birthday Basher
description:
Oh no! You're a jerk who hates enjoyment! Spread your despair across several birthday parties!

This game is made for the Low Effort Game Jam

Music - Sweat Treats from 41 Short, Loopable Background Music Files by joshuuu

SFX from SoupTonic's sound SFX Pack 1 - UI menu sounds by SoupTonic
